thread.title: Ellie Goulding feeling 'broody'
thread.title_full: Ellie Goulding feeling 'broody' - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ellie Goulding feeling 'broody'
text:
Singer Ellie Goulding says she's feeling "broody" and has spoken about having children with her long-term boyfriend Dougie Poynter.
READ: Ellie Goulding was 'addicted' to chocolates
Listen to Ellie Goulding on Gaana.com
The On my mind hitmaker is eager to settle down with Poynter, reports femalefirst.co.uk.
"My sister had a baby five months ago and she's the most adorable kid. She is gorgeous and I'm not just saying that. Having a baby is so life affirming and such a beautiful thing," Goulding told The Sun newspaper.
"And I'm nearly 30. I'm not a teenager any more so yes, I'm broody. Dougie and I do talk about babies, it's natural I suppose. We talk without it being weird," she added.
